## CardContainer.remove() method

Remove a specific card from this container. The given card must actually be inside this container.

**Signature:**

```typescript
remove(card: TCard): TCard;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  card | TCard | Card to remove. |

**Returns:**

TCard

The removed card.
